  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81227</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81227</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Satellite en orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Satellite in orbit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satellit in der Bahn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Satélite na órbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Satellite in orbita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δορυφόρος στην τροχιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Satélite en órbita</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">C'est la zone de traçage du temps que cela prend à un satellite pour orbiter la terre une fois en fonction de sa hauteur par rapport à la surface de la Terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This is the plotting area for the time it takes a satellite to orbit the Earth once in terms of its height about the Earth's surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">taille</string>
            <string language="en">Height</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">satellite</string>
            <string language="en">satellite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps</string>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist der plottende Bereich während der 
Zeit, die er einen Satelliten nimmt, um die Masse in seiner Höhe 
über die Oberfläche der Masse ausgedrückt einmal in Umlauf zu 
bringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é a área traçando por o tempo onde faz 
exame de um satélite para orbitar uma vez a terra nos termos de sua 
altura sobre a superfície da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la zona di tracciato per il tempo che 
prende un satellite per orbitare intorno una volta alla terra in 
termini di relativa altezza circa la superficie della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η περιοχή χάραξης για το χρόνο που 
παίρνει έναν δορυφόρο για να βάλει τη γη μιά φορά από την 
άποψη του ύψους της για τη γήινη επιφάνεια σε τροχιά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es el área que traza por el tiempo que toma
un satélite para mover en órbita alrededor de la tierra una vez en 
términos de su altura sobre la superficie de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Höhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Satellit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Altura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">satélite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Altezza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιά</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
